Chi Trung Nguyen (24)

I am an IT-Consultant, Hacker, Webdeveloper and MacHead based in Berlin.



If you would like to get in touch with me, feel free to message me via mail or leave a tweet for me. You can also visit my LinkedIn or XING Profile, a resume is available online too. Leave me a message and I'll send you the link. To see with what code I'm fiddling or playing at the moment, visit GitHub.
I occasionally take photos on Instagram or make music on SoundCloud. If you would like to find out our musical compatibility, take a tour at Last.FM.

Max Liese & Alex Brandt ft. Chesqua - Let's Get Lost

So after three days of shooting and long nights of editing Tim and me (aka Owlographics) finally finished the first Music Video for Max Liese. It was a fun and intense shooting with Nana, Charly and Qudus! Thanks to all who made it possible to realize this huge project :)
